title: SpatialVID: A Large-Scale Video Dataset with Spatial Annotations
summary: This paper introduces SpatialVID, a large-scale video dataset with spatial annotations, addressing the scarcity of high-quality training data for spatial intelligence, spatial reconstruction, and world exploration in real-world dynamic scenes.
usefulness_reason: Score 70 assigned because the paper directly relates to "Spatio Temporal" through "Spatial Annotations" and "real-world dynamic scenes". The introduction of a "Large-Scale Video Dataset" is highly relevant to "Contextual dataset". While "Point Process" and "Survey data" are not explicitly mentioned, the core themes align well with the broader search criteria.
